bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with xie shi 斜視 . Lei gong pao zhi lun 雷公炮炙論 Xu 序：目辟眼 㞎 ，有五花而自正。 五加皮，其葉有雄雌，三葉為雄，五葉為雌，須使五葉者，作末酒浸飲 之，其目喎者正 , “For squint , there is wu hua . [Its application] will straighten [the eyes]. [ Wu hua ] is wu jia pi . The leaves of this [plant] show it to be male or female. Those with three leaves are male; those with five leaves are female. One must make use of those with five leaves, prepare a powder, steep in wine, and drink this. Wry eyes will straighten themselves again”.
